New Records: Sunil Chhetri scored his 94th international goal
Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri scored a penalty in the 38th minute
Rahmat Akbari scored the equalizer in the 70th minute
Sharif Mukhammad scored a penalty in the 88th minute
Pre-Game Insights: India desperately needed full points from this encounter to keep alive their hopes of a long and arduous journey to the third round
Post-Match Reflections: The loss of three points in this home tie left India with just four points from four matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: India took the lead in the 38th minute after a handball by Haroon Amiri
Others: India have two more matches in hand, while Afghanistan can aspire to overtake India in the points table
